page.title: 18SOCIAL MOBILITY
page.content: {REASONS}FOR MOVING INTO THE AREA MAINLY INVOLVED A LIKING FOR SETTING AND A PROXIMITY TO WORKING LOCATIONS. ABOUT ONE THIRD OF THOSE INTERVIEWED CAME FOR RETIREMENT; THE REMAINDER WERE EVENLY DISTRIBUTED IN THESE WORK LOCATIONS: (A) LONDON AND THE COAST (B) THIS LOCALITY (C) DOMESTIC.{DAILY {MOVEMENTS}OUTSIDE THE AREA WERE MAINLY DUE TO COMMUTING FOR WORK OR SCHOOL BUT NEARLY ALL MADE SHOPPING TRIPS, VISITED FRIENDS OR RELATIVES, AND PURSUED LEISURE INTERESTS BEYOND THE AREA WITH THE LATTER INCREASING AT WEEKENDS, ESPECIALLY FOR CULTURAL EVENTS. VISITS TO SHOPPING AREAS AND TO FRIENDS WERE OFTEN COMBINED BUT RARELY BEYOND SUSSEX. CULTURAL EVENTS} AND SOME LEISURE PURSUITS TOOK THEM TO COASTAL TOWNS, CHICHESTER AND LONDON. {FURTHER LONG DISTANCES}ONLY INVOLVED HOLIDAYS OR URGENT VISITS TO RELATIVES
